reference-code.description: CELLA Composite Score and CELLA Reading Score
Score at or above the proficient level on a State approved listening/speaking assessment
Score at or above the 33rd national percentile on the reading comprehension and writing
FCAT level 3 or greater or the equivalent developmental scale score on the Reading test
FCAT level 3 or greater on the Writing+ of the Sunshine State Standards
District-proposed alternative exit standard as amended into the District's ELL Plan
For grades K-2, qualifying exit scores on the EL Assessments per Rule 6A-6.0903
For grades 3-10, qualifying exit scores on the EL Assessments per Rule 6A-6.0903
For grades 10-12, qualifying exit scores on the EL Assessments per Rule 6A-6.0903
Reading and Writing-for use only with students exited from an ESOL prior to July 2008
